name: Tales of Misteria
description:
STORY:
When college kids Ame and Kira return to their hometown of Misteria for their long awaited Halloween break... what greets them is the news of a murder case that they have absolutely nothing to do with.  

They're not stupid enough to get involved, right?

HAHAHA... ha... right?

NOTE: the game would sometimes get an error when on the main menu. Just click 'ignore'.

FEATURES:

-Original Art (CGs, BGs, Sprites)

-More than 15k words

-Tons of bad ends

-Walkthrough txt file in the folder

-Spot the references ;) 

-.... And more to discover!

CREDITS:
